title: Transposition sensor and phase sequence sensor
fullText:
If a transposition sensor is installed in a recreational vehicle or non-recreational vehicle, the transposition sensor shall be installed to the requirements of Clause 2.6.4.2.
If a phase sequence sensor is installed in a recreational vehicle or non-recreational vehicle, the phase sequence sensor shall be installed to the requirements of Clause 2.6.3.
See exceptions to Clauses 4.8.1.2, 4.8.1.6 and 4.9.1 regarding switches operating in all live (active and neutral) conductors.
